dynamic_elements.chart_title: Top 10 most cited organizations in MusicBo

dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

PREFIX dul: <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/dul/DUL.owl#>

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>

PREFIX sc: <http://purl.org/science/owl/sciencecommons/>

PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>

PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>

PREFIX p: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/>

PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

PREFIX ps: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/>

PREFIX psv: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/value/>

PREFIX wdr: <http://www.w3.org/2007/05/powder#>

PREFIX amr: <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/>

SELECT DISTINCT  ?slabel ?point  ?lat ?long 

WHERE { 


   ?subject a <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/Organization>;

  <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/name> ?slabel ;

  ?isconnectedto ?cityUri .


  ?cityUri rdf:type amr:City ; 

    owl:sameAs ?point ; 

    amr:name ?label .


  FILTER (regex(str(?point), "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/", "i"))


  ?frameInstance ?p ?cityUri ; 

    rdf:type ?frame . 
    FILTER regex (?label, "Bologna", "i")


SERVICE <https://query.wikidata.org/bigdata/namespace/wdq/sparql> 

  { ?point wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q515 . 

    ?point p:P625 ?coords_stmt . 

    ?coords_stmt ps:P625 ?coords;

      psv:P625 [ wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat; wikibase:geoLongitude ?long ] . 

  }


  }

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Bologna's organizations and their occurrences in MusicBo
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dul: <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/dul/DUL.owl#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX sc: <http://purl.org/science/owl/sciencecommons/>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX p: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX ps: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/>
PREFIX psv: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/statement/value/>
PREFIX wdr: <http://www.w3.org/2007/05/powder#>
PREFIX amr: <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/>
SELECT DISTINCT  ?label (COUNT(distinct ?subject) as ?count)
WHERE {
    ?subject a amr:Organization ;
<http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/name> ?label ;
  ?isconnectedto ?cityUri .
  ?cityUri rdf:type amr:City ;
	owl:sameAs ?point ;
	amr:name ?plabel .
 
  ?frameInstance ?p ?cityUri ;
	rdf:type ?frame .
   FILTER regex (?plabel, "Bologna", "i")

 
  }
 
GROUP BY ?label ?count 
ORDER BY DESC (?count)

dynamic_elements.table_title: Bologna's organizations and their foundation year
Philharmonic Academy of Bologna: the building
dynamic_elements.table_query:
PREFIX arco-catalogue: <https://w3id.org/arco/ontology/catalogue/>
PREFIX arco: <https://w3id.org/arco/ontology/arco/>
PREFIX a-cd: <https://w3id.org/arco/ontology/context-description/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX agent: <https://w3id.org/arco/resource/Agent/>
PREFIX cis: <http://dati.beniculturali.it/cis/>
PREFIX clv: <https://w3id.org/italia/onto/CLV/>
PREFIX core: <https://w3id.org/arco/ontology/core/>
PREFIX a-ip: <https://w3id.org/arco/ontology/immovable-property/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?Building ?ConstructionDate ?CulturalScope ?ArchitecturalLayout ?Picture 
WHERE  
{
  SERVICE <https://dati.cultura.gov.it/sparql> {
    ?s a arco:ArchitecturalOrLandscapeHeritage ;
       rdfs:label ?Building .
    FILTER regex(?Building, "Palazzo della Accademia Filarmonica", "i")
    
    ?s a-cd:hasDating ?d .
    ?d a-cd:hasDatingEvent ?e .
    ?e <https://w3id.org/italia/onto/TI/atTime> ?t .
    ?t rdfs:label ?ConstructionDate.
    
    ?s a-cd:hasAuthorshipAttribution ?c . 
    ?c a-cd:hasCulturalScope ?cscope . 
    ?cscope rdfs:label ?CulturalScope.
    

  ?s a-ip:hasLayout ?layout . 
  ?layout rdfs:label ?ArchitecturalLayout . 

    OPTIONAL { ?s foaf:depiction ?Picture } 
  }
}
LIMIT 1

dynamic_elements.text:
The Baroque Concerto, A.J.B. Hutchings (1961)

"After his Italian tour of 1770, Burney wrote of Torelli: ' This author, who was a member of the Philharmonic Academy of Bologna and the first violin of the church of San Petronio in the same city, published seven different works for violin."

citizenship: Other violinists of the same citizenship
